titles.title: To limit United States contributions to the United Nations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Operations and Human Rights.

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Limits U.S. contributions to the United Nations to an amount which bears the same ratio to the total budget of the United Nations as the total population of the United States bears to the total population of all the member states of the United Nations.
